item.title: Someone read and help please
item.dc:creator: @Party_Boy_Rulez Party Boy Rulez
item.description:
@Party_Boy_Rulez wrote:

Before you edit the “donttouch.txt”, you start out as “owner”.

You will not see your gold crown, but if anyone else was on, they would.
To make someone else and mod, admin, or owner, go to there (username).txt, and change you will see this:

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = REMOVED FOR PRIVACY REASONS
character-password = REMOVED FOR PRIVACY REASONS

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3240
character-posy = 3526
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = REMOVED FOR PRIVACY REASONE
character-lastlogin = REMOVED FOR PRIVACY REASONS
character-energy = 999999
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 54279

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 1057 1
character-equip = 1 4151 1

character-equip = 3 2414 1
character-equip = 4 3140 1

character-equip = 6 -1 0

character-equip = 9 5556 1

[LOOK]

[SKILLS]

[EOF]

[/code]

Change

character-rights = 3

to these:

For REGULAR player put this:

character-rights = 0

For PLAYER MODERATORS put this:

character-rights = 1

For ADMINISTRATOR put this:

character-rights = 3

Also, ^ can be used for Co-Owner, it just means that they can do ANYTHING on the server.
